rukus.text: And remember when We took from the children of Israel a covenant, saying, "Serve you none but Allah, and to your two parents show kindness, and to your kindred and the orphans and the needy, and speak to men kindly, and be steadfast in prayer, and gi
And remember when We took a covenant from you, "shed not your kinsmanÂ´s blood, nor turn your kinsmen out of their homes:" then did you confirm it and were witnesses thereto

Yet you were those who slay your kinsmen and turn a party out of their homes, and back each other up against them with sin and enmity. But if they come to you as captives you ransom them! - and yet it is as unlawful for you to turn them out. Do you then b
Those who have bought this worldly life with the price of the Hereafter, the torment shall not be lightened from them nor shall they be helped
